poem:
**A Technocrat's Departure**

He came with steel  
and fiery whim,  
a chainsawed dance  
of power's trim.  
Whispers of engines,  
and digital dreams,  
we bled the time,  
laughter's seams.  
Now vacant echoes  
in halls remain,  
as Musk's shadow  
slips the chain.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Jimmy Kimmel on Elon Musk’s Doge tenure: ‘He came, he chainsawed, we bled, he left’ With most late-night hosts on vacation, Jimmy Kimmel celebrates the end of Elon Musk’s term in Washington and riffs on the new Taco nickname for Donald Trump. Jimmy Kimmel Jimmy Kimmel celebrated a big announcement on Thursday evening: Elon Musk, Donald Trump’s head of the so-called “department of government efficiency” (Doge), posted on X that he would officially step down". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Jimmy Kimmel on Elon Musk’s Doge tenure: ‘He came, he chainsawed, we bled, he left’ With most late-night hosts on vacation, Jimmy Kimmel celebrates the end of Elon Musk’s term in Washington and riffs on the new Taco nickname for Donald Trump. Jimmy Kimmel Jimmy Kimmel celebrated a big announcement on Thursday evening: Elon Musk, Donald Trump’s head of the so-called “department of government efficiency” (Doge), posted on X that he would officially step down
